mapper.select: select PROC_DEF_ID from act_hi_procinst where PROC_INST_ID = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_contact_info ( CNT_ID, PROC_INS_ID, CNT_CODE, CNT_NAME, CNT_TYPE, CNT_PRICE, CNT_AMOUNT, CNT_QUALITY, CNT_ADMIN, CNT_SIGN_TIME, CNT_TERM, CNT_PERFOM_PLACE, CNT_PERFOM_MODE, CNT_STANDARD, CNT_BREACH, CNT_METHOD, CNT_RESERVE1, CNT_RESERVE2, CNT_RESERVE3, CNT_RESERVE4, CNT_RESERVE5, sqr, sex, sfz, dw, zw, gw, sdate, qdate, bh, cn, site, "add", phone, sl, jrsl ) values ( #{cntId}, #{procInsId}, #{cntCode}, #{cntName}, #{cntType}, #{cntPrice}, #{cntAmount}, #{cntQuality}, #{cntAdmin}, #{cntSignTime}, #{cntTerm}, #{cntPerfomPlace}, #{cntPerfomMode}, #{cntStandard}, #{cntBreach}, #{cntMethod}, #{cntReserve1}, #{cntReserve2}, #{cntReserve3}, #{cntReserve4}, #{cntReserve5}, #{sqr}, #{sex}, #{sfz}, #{dw}, #{zw}, #{gw}, #{sdate}, #{qdate}, #{bh}, #{cn}, #{site}, #{add}, #{phone}, #{sl}, #{jrsl} )
mapper.delete:
delete from tb_contact_info where CNT_ID in
#{cntId}
